div.p: [...] has sent me a copy of the letter [...] has permitted to use up [the water ...] the sluice gates and let them be [...] and let them be opened [...]. Philippos to Dionysios, greetings. [...] and that of Damis was attached to [...] five. If he/they come(s) [...] Maimachos and his men [...] let him use up the water [...] let the gates be lifted up [...] also the sesame [land ...] has not been finished [...] to pay and [...] the head of [...]dros. Translation: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 93, Â© Peeters
